candies put of for the guests to enjoy .
the ladies look great in their costumes .
the family pet enjoys the party while holding a pumpkin
spider web cupcakes for the guests to enjoy .
output.sentences: It's Halloween and my lovely girlfriend made a huge effort to make sure our guests enjoyed our party.
The guests really loved the specialty candy, including a lot of stuff they hadn't seen in years.
There was a very competitive ladies costume contest.
Pets were also welcomed to come and enjoyed sniffing the pumpkins.
Stella brought these amazing spider web donuts, I ate like 3 of them.
